snippet.title: Celebrities DEFENDING Johnny Depp against Amber Heard Pt. 2 (Penélope Cruz, Winona Ryder and JK. R.)
snippet.description:
Celebrities DEFENDING Johnny Depp against Amber Heard Pt. 2 (Penélope Cruz, Winona Ryder and JK. R.) 
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are facing each other in an ongoing but lengthy trial regarding the allegations of domestic abuse. In this context, many celebrities have come forward to speak in favor of Johnny Depp. The celebrities openly defend Johnny Depp and even share their experience of how they know him as a wonderful person. It’s actually pretty interesting as celebrities aren’t really jumping on board to take Amber Heard’s side, which means she is a little sidelined. We have Penelope Cruz, along with Winona Ryder and J.K Rowling in this video, giving it all they’ve got to defend Johnny Depp.

Here on Film Streak we are all about the latest spill in Hollywood! You can rest assure that we will bring you all the latest celebrity drama and gossip especially concerning you favorite actors! We´ll also make sure to keep you updated on the newest movie updates and releases – so if you are interested in anything that happens in Hollywood, you should make sure to stay tuned!  

And there you have it guys! We hope you enjoyed the video! If you did please consider leaving a like and telling us what you though in the comments! 

Here are some links to some of our other videos that you might find interesting as well:

Emilia Clarke REACTION Before Replacing Amber Heard in Aquaman 2! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PYXp9wXHUWw
